headline: UBS starts coverage on packaged food stocks with cautious tone, Sell on Freshpet
summary: Investing.com -- UBS began coverage of several packaged food companies with a cautious outlook, citing softening consumer trends and questions around margin expansion. The brokerage issued a Sell rating on Freshpet, while initiating McCormick (NYSE:MKC) and Conagra with Neutral ratings.

content.title: UBS starts coverage on packaged food stocks with cautious tone, Sell on Freshpet

The brokerage issued a Sell rating on Freshpet, while initiating McCormick (NYSE:MKC) and Conagra with Neutral ratings.
